dcterms:creator: Van-Hoang Nguyen
Kazunari Sugiyama
Preslav Nakov
Min-Yen Kan
dcterms:description: The dataset FANG was composed in a study based on datasets collected by related work on rumor and news classification. It includes news content obtained through provided news URLs and user profiles from Twitter, with labels obtained from fact-checking websites.
dcterms:title: FANG

dcterms:creator: Enyan Dai
Yiwei Sun
Suhang Wang
dcterms:description: FakeHealth is a publicly available benchmark dataset for fake news detection, mainly focused on the healthcare domain. It consists of two subsets, with HealthStory being used in the study due to the larger number of articles.
dcterms:title: FakeHealth
